Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-6052 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.78.6-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-6052 affecting package glib for versions less than 2.78.6-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glib is earlier than 2.78.6-3, affected by CVE-2025-6052
